mapper.sql: ssp.RID, ssp.EVENT_SOURCE, ssp.CLIENTNAME, ssp.REPORT_CITY, ssp.EVENT_TYPE1, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL, ssp.THREAT_NAME, ssp.THREAT_TYPE1, ssp.THREAT_TYPE2, ssp.THREAT_TYPE3, ssp.THREAT_TYPE4, ssp.ACCESS_ID, ssp.ROOM_NAME, ssp.ROOM_IDX, ssp.DOMAIN_NAME, ssp.CC_DOMAIN, ssp.IP, ssp.ATTACK_IP, ssp.SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGES, ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE, ssp.IS_WHITE_LIST, ssp.FORCE_CLOSE_DESC, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM, ssp.CLOSE_TERM, ssp.SEND_TIME, ssp.SEND_TIMESTAMP, ssp.RECTIFY_STATE, ssp.RECTIFY_MEASURE, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIME, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, ssp.WEB_CASE_RID, ssp.MAPPING_MODE, ssp.MEMO, ssp.CREATTIME, ssp.MODIFIEDTIME, ssp.RECORDSTATE, ssp.KEYWORDS, ssp.SNAPSHOP, ssp.URL, sii.IDC_ID, sii.IDC_NAME

ssp.RID, ssp.EVENT_SOURCE, ssp.CLIENTNAME, ssp.REPORT_CITY, ssp.EVENT_TYPE1, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL, ssp.THREAT_NAME, ssp.THREAT_TYPE1, ssp.THREAT_TYPE2, ssp.THREAT_TYPE3, ssp.THREAT_TYPE4, ssp.ACCESS_ID, ssp.ROOM_NAME, ssp.ROOM_IDX, ssp.DOMAIN_NAME, ssp.CC_DOMAIN, ssp.IP, ssp.ATTACK_IP, ssp.SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGES, ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE, ssp.IS_WHITE_LIST, ssp.FORCE_CLOSE_DESC, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM, ssp.CLOSE_TERM, ssp.SEND_TIME, ssp.SEND_TIMESTAMP, ssp.RECTIFY_STATE, ssp.RECTIFY_MEASURE, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIME, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, ssp.WEB_CASE_RID, ssp.MAPPING_MODE, ssp.MEMO, ssp.CREATTIME, ssp.MODIFIEDTIME, ssp.RECORDSTATE, ssp.KEYWORDS, ssp.SNAPSHOP, ssp.URL, sii.IDC_ID, sii.IDC_NAME
mapper.select: select count(WEB_CASE_RID) as WEBCASETOTAL,max(rid) as MAIN_RID from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN where RECORDSTATE='0'and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and WEB_CASE_RID=#{WEB_CASE_RID}
select count(DOMAIN_NAME) as DOMAINTOTAL,max(rid) as MAIN_RID from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN where RECORDSTATE='0' and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and DOMAIN_NAME=#{DOMAIN_NAME}
select count(IP) as IPTOTAL,max(rid) as MAIN_RID from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN where RECORDSTATE='0' and RECTIFY_STATE='000' and IP=#{IP}

select ssp.url as URL, ssp.SNAPSHOP as SNAPSHOP, ssp.ACCESS_ID as ACCESS_ID, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL as DAMAGE_CLASS, swc.SPONSER_CASE_NUM as CASE_ID, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM as RECTIFY_TERM, ssp.CLOSE_TERM as CLOSE_TERM, ssp.rid as EVENT_ID,
CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(ssp.THREAT_TYPE1,'_'),ssp.THREAT_TYPE2),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE3),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE4) as SECURITY_TYPE
ssp.THREAT_TYPE1 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE2 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE3 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE4 as SECURITY_TYPE
from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN as ssp left JOIN smms_web_case as swc on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=swc.rid
ssp.RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE='1' and ssp.RECORDSTATE='0'
${RIDCONDITION}

select ssp.rid as EVENT_ID, ssp.url as URL,
CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(ssp.THREAT_TYPE1,'_'),ssp.THREAT_TYPE2),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE3),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE4) as SECURITY_TYPE,
ssp.THREAT_TYPE1 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE2 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE3 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE4 as SECURITY_TYPE,
ssp.THREAT_LEVEL as DAMAGE_CLASS, ssp.ACCESS_ID as ACCESS_ID, ssp.FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST as RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM as RECTIFY_TERM, swc.SPONSER_CASE_NUM as CASE_ID, ssp.SNAPSHOP as SNAPSHOP from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN as ssp left JOIN smms_web_case as swc on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=swc.rid
ssp.RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE='2' and ssp.RECORDSTATE='0'
${RIDCONDITION}

select ssp.rid as EVENT_ID, ssp.url as URL,
CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(ssp.THREAT_TYPE1,'_'),ssp.THREAT_TYPE2),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE3),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE4) as SECURITY_TYPE,
ssp.THREAT_TYPE1 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE2 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE3 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE4 as SECURITY_TYPE,
ssp.THREAT_LEVEL as DAMAGE_CLASS, ssp.ACCESS_ID as ACCESS_ID, ssp.FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST as RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM as RECTIFY_TERM, swc.SPONSER_CASE_NUM as CASE_ID, ssp.SNAPSHOP as SNAPSHOP from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN as ssp left JOIN smms_web_case as swc on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=swc.rid where ssp.RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE='2' and ssp.RECORDSTATE='0' order by ssp.access_id asc

select ssp.url as URL, ssp.SNAPSHOP as SNAPSHOP, ssp.ACCESS_ID as ACCESS_ID, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL as DAMAGE_CLASS, swc.SPONSER_CASE_NUM as CASE_ID, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM as RECTIFY_TERM, ssp.CLOSE_TERM as CLOSE_TERM, ssp.rid as EVENT_ID,
CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(ssp.THREAT_TYPE1,'_'),ssp.THREAT_TYPE2),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE3),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE4) as SECURITY_TYPE
ssp.THREAT_TYPE1 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE2 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE3 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE4 as SECURITY_TYPE
from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN as ssp left JOIN smms_web_case as swc on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=swc.rid where ssp.RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE='1' and ssp.RECORDSTATE='0' order by ssp.access_id asc

select ssi.ACCESS_IP as IP, ssp.DOMAIN_NAME as DOMAIN from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN as ssp left JOIN smms_web_case as swc on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=swc.rid left join smms_web_case_ip as ssi on swc.rid=ssi.case_rid where ssp.RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE='1' and ssp.RECORDSTATE='0' order by ssp.access_id asc
select MAPPING_MODE from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN as ssp left JOIN smms_web_case as swc on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=swc.rid where ssp.RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE='1' and ssp.RECORDSTATE='0'

SELECT sii.rid as SIIRID, sii.IDC_NAME as IDC_NAME, ssr.rid as SSRRID, ssr.ROOM_NAME as ROOM_NAME, ssr.ROOM_IDX as ROOM_IDX, ssr.ROOM_ADDRESS as ROOM_ADDRESS FROM
smms_room_info as ssr left join smms_idc_info as sii on ssr.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID where ssr.ACCESS_ID=#{ACCESS_ID} and ssr.ROOM_IDX=#{ROOM_IDX} and ssr.RECORDSTATE='0'
mapper.update: update SMMS_EVENT_MAIN set IS_WHITE_LIST='1' where RID=#{RID}
mapper.select: select ,sii.IDC_NAME as TRANS_IDC_ID from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN as ssp left join smms_idc_info as sii on ssp.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID where ssp.RID = #{RID}
mapper.update: update SMMS_EVENT_MAIN set RECORDSTATE=#{RECORDSTATE} where RID=#{RID}
mapper.select: select from SMMS_EVENT_MAIN as ssp left join smms_idc_info as sii on ssp.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID where ssp.RID = #{RID}
mapper.insert:
insert into SMMS_EVENT_MAIN (
EVENT_SOURCE, CLIENTNAME, REPORT_CITY, EVENT_TYPE1, THREAT_LEVEL, THREAT_NAME, THREAT_TYPE1, THREAT_TYPE2, THREAT_TYPE3, THREAT_TYPE4, ACCESS_ID, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_IDX, DOMAIN_NAME, CC_DOMAIN, IP, ATTACK_IP, SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGES, IS_FORCE_CLOSE, IS_WHITE_LIST, FORCE_CLOSE_DESC, RECTIFY_TERM, CLOSE_TERM, SEND_TIME, SEND_TIMESTAMP, RECTIFY_STATE, RECTIFY_MEASURE, FEEDBACK_TIME, FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, WEB_CASE_RID, MAPPING_MODE, MEMO, CREATTIME, MODIFIEDTIME, RECORDSTATE, SNAPSHOP, KEYWORDS, URL, RID ) values (
#{EVENT_SOURCE}, #{CLIENTNAME}, #{REPORT_CITY}, #{EVENT_TYPE1}, #{THREAT_LEVEL},1, #{THREAT_NAME},999, #{THREAT_TYPE1},999, #{THREAT_TYPE2}, #{THREAT_TYPE3}, #{THREAT_TYPE4}, #{ACCESS_ID}, #{ROOM_NAME}, #{ROOM_IDX}, #{DOMAIN_NAME}, #{CC_DOMAIN}, #{IP}, #{ATTACK_IP}, #{SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST}, #{FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGES}, #{IS_FORCE_CLOSE},2, #{IS_WHITE_LIST},2, #{FORCE_CLOSE_DESC}, #{RECTIFY_TERM}, #{CLOSE_TERM}, #{SEND_TIME}, #{SEND_TIMESTAMP}, #{RECTIFY_STATE}, #{RECTIFY_MEASURE}, #{FEEDBACK_TIME}, #{FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP}, #{WEB_CASE_RID}, #{MAPPING_MODE}, #{MEMO}, #{CREATTIME}, #{MODIFIEDTIME}, #{RECORDSTATE}, #{SNAPSHOP}, #{KEYWORDS}, #{URL}, #{RID})
